Entries.SuanNi: Thank you for your kindness, I will cherish it/434 102 109 275 114 163 202 260/Thank you very much, this is very much to my heart/74 210 70/Thank you for your trouble./128 153 66 78/...Could I have been cheated?/167 171 170 346 348/Yes, this is what you like now?/16 18 22 20 24/
I didn't know you had this custom. $1#$b# It's really interesting. $1#$e# If I have the chance, I'd like to try it. $1

I could secretly tell you where the eggs are. $1#$b#But I think it's better not to. $1#$e#I still remember the first time you participated in this festival. Who could have imagined what would happen now? $1
Looking for me?! $7#$e#Ahem.....Sorry, I...was a little surprised. $7
@, you are here too. $1#$b#I really like this atmosphere, where people's emotions are intertwined. $1#$b#It is really warm. $1
I had some conversation with the gentleman next to me. $1#$e#Western techniques are very new to me. $1#$e#It seems that you are already familiar with dealing with such transcendent beings. $1
Do you have to go fishing during this festival? $1#$e#Did you add catnip to that pot of soup? Strange...$1#$e#Want to enjoy the sea breeze with me? Be careful not to catch a cold. $4

Changes.LogName: Dance of the Moonlight Jellies - Dialogue

Entries.SuanNi: I was just thinking about some past events. Sorry, don't mind me...$2#$e#%Suan Ni is immersed in his thoughts, so don't disturb him.

Changes.LogName: Dance of the Moonlight Jellies - Spouse Dialogue 1

Entries.SuanNi: If there is a chance, I will take you to see the sea in my hometown. $4#$b#%The tail of the Suanni hooks your arm and gently strokes it.......#$e#Stay with me for a while, okay? $1

Changes.LogName: Dance of the Moonlight Jellies - Spouse Dialogue 2

Entries.SuanNi: This jellyfish seems to contain some kind of energy, so beautiful and dazzling. $1#$b#Same as you....$4#$e#%The blush on Suanni's face is a little obvious under the light, but this is the proof that he loves you, isn't it?
I felt a lot of emotions. $1#$b# It was refreshing. $1
I have seen all the preparations these days, thank you for your hard work. $1#$e# Go and get ready, I'm right here. $1
%Suanni rubbed your head. #$b# Go and prepare for the exhibition. $1
This kind of festival is really wonderful. $1#$e#If you are scared, you can call me to go with you. $1#$e#
Do you need me to carry you? $1#$b# If you are not afraid, can I not carry you? $1#$e#% You seem to feel a breath of air around you. #$b# Don't worry, I will accompany you. $1
Don't worry about my body, this fur is very warm. $1
Can I have a taste of the fish I caught? $1#$b#You ask me why? $1#$b#Because of you. $4

Changes.LogName: Feat of the Winter Star - Dialogue

Entries.SuanNi: You can find me like this? $2#$b#Okay, I just...just remembered some old things. $2#$e#In my hometown, there is also a festival with a strong sense of the same. $2#$b#Hometown...$2

Changes.LogName: Festival of the Winter Star - Spouse Dialogue

Entries.SuanNi: Sorry, did I make you worry? $2#$b#I just want to be alone. $1#$b#Don't worry, I already have you. $1#$e#Stay with me for a while, just a while...$1

Entries.SuanNi0: I...I don't know what to say...$2#$b#As soon as I saw you, I couldn't suppress my emotions. $1#$e#@...Thank you for being willing to approach me in the beginning. $4#$b#If you don't leave, I will never give up. $4
Entries.SuanNi1: @,The agreed date is coming soon, and I am a little worried. $2#$b#Will being with me bring you trouble? After all, in the eyes of outsiders, I am not a human being. $2#$b#%The ears of the Suanni drooped, and the pair of golden pupils seemed to be much dimmer. $2#$e#Sorry, I shouldn't say this. $1#$b#%The Suanni smiled at you, and you could clearly see the worry and anxiety hidden in it.

Entries.ExtraDialogue_Mines_PlayerKilled_SuanNi_: I sensed that your life force seemed very weak...$2#$b# so I found it...$2#$b# Fortunately I made it in time. $2#$b# Fortunately I made it in time......
Are you okay? #$b#The mist told me your situation. Don't worry, you are saved now.
Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue1_SuanNi: I am thinking back to the past %year...
Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue1B_SuanNi: The time I spent with you seems so precious at this moment. $1
Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue2_SuanNi: …Just to think, we’ve come this far.
Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_SuanNi: I used to want to escape from everything here. $2#$b#But now it's different. $1#$b#I have you, my friends in Stardew Valley. $1#$b#And this scenery at the moment. $1#$b#Everything is so harmonious and warm."pause 500/speak SuanNi "What I want to say is. $1#$b#Thank you, @. $1#$b#For being with me for so long....$4"
Entries.PurchasedItem_SuanNi_QualityLow: Hmm... I received a {2}. #$b# It seems you are selling it? #$b# But his spirit seems to have begun to dissipate...
Entries.PurchasedItem_SuanNi_QualityHigh: Hmm... I received a {2}. #$b# It seems you are selling it? #$b# It tastes pretty good. $1#$b# I couldn't help but taste it. $1
Entries.PurchasedItem_SuanNi: The {2} in Pierre's shop seemed to be in good condition and well preserved.
Entries.PurchasedItem_1_QualityHigh_SuanNi_Willy: @, your fish is very good and delicious. $1
Entries.PurchasedItem_2_QualityHigh_SuanNi_Willy: I often go to Willy's place. The fish you sold him last time was delicious. $1
Entries.PurchasedItem_3_QualityHigh_SuanNi_Willy: Did you give that {2} to Willy? #$b# It's really good quality. $1
Entries.PurchasedItem_4_QualityHigh_SuanNi_Willy: You are here, @. $1#$b#I also tasted the {2} you sold to Willy, it tastes good. $1
Entries.PurchasedItem_SuanNi_QualityHigh_Willy: The {2} you gave me last time was the flavor I liked. $1
Entries.PurchasedItem_1_QualityLow_SuanNi_Willy: Um.....@#$b#The fish you gave Willy...#$b#Never mind, it's okay. $1
Entries.PurchasedItem_2_QualityLow_SuanNi_Willy: This {2}, the spirit seems to be dissipating. #$b#Did you sell it to Willy?
Entries.PurchasedItem_3_QualityLow_SuanNi_Willy: @, there seemed to be some problem with the {2} you gave Willy last time.
Entries.PurchasedItem_4_QualityLow_SuanNi_Willy: .......$2#$b#Sorry, I was thinking about this {2} thing.
Entries.PurchasedItem_SuanNi_QualityLow_Willy: The {2} you gave me last time seemed to taste a little strange.

Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @...Suan Ni...#$b#As the mayor of Pelican Town and the person in charge of marriage in this area, I now officially declare that your marriage is settled! $h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @...Suan Ni...#$b#As the mayor of Pelican Town and the person in charge of marriage in this area, I now officially declare that your marriage is settled! $h
Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first came to Pelican Town, no one knew if he could fit in with this community...#$b# But from today on, @ will become an inseparable part of the town! $h#$b# I am honored to announce that on this day of {1}{0}, @ and Suanni are getting married.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first came to Pelican Town, no one knew if she could adapt to this community...#$b# But from today on, @ will become an inseparable part of the town! $h#$b# I am honored to announce that on this day of {1}{0}, @ and Suanni are getting married.

Entries.SuanNiWoods1: @台鉴: ^The turbid mist, the worried flowers, my mind is in a mess, and my thoughts are thick. ^I wonder if you have some free time these days, can you come to the secret forest and listen to my talk. ^I am looking forward to it. ^ -Fu Ni
Entries.SuanNiTown2: @Dear Taiwan: ^I was lucky to have you help me yesterday. ^My power has been restored to balance. From now on, I will look within myself. ^I have enclosed a thank you gift.^  -Suanni%item object 74 1 %%

Entries.9876501/F/f SuanNi 500/t 600 2400: Cloth/49 32/farmer 49 36 0 SuanNi 49 32 0/skippable/pause 1500/emote SuanNi 12/pause 1500/move farmer 0 -3 0/emote SuanNi 12/pause 1500/faceDirection SuanNi 2/speak SuanNi "Sorry, I didn't notice you approaching....$2"/speak SuanNi "$q -2 null#What do you want from me?#$r -2 25 dx#I feel like you're worried about something.#$r -2 25 dx1#Are you having any difficulties?"/pause 800/speak SuanNi "I just....remembered some things from the past. $2"/emote SuanNi 40/pause 500/speak SuanNi "Do you know why I stayed under this tree? $2#$b#There was also such a peach tree in my old yard. #$b#%The golden eyes of Suanni dimmed, and he didn't seem to restrain his emotions towards you. #$b#This town is nice, really nice, and the residents are very friendly to me. $2#$b#But..."/pause 800/speak SuanNi "I miss my peach tree a little. $2#$b#I'm sorry, I shouldn't say this to you. $2#$b#Just think of me talking to myself. #$b#%The lion in front of you gave you an apologetic smile, then turned into mist and floated away."/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end invisible SuanNi

Entries.9876502/F/e 9876501/f SuanNi 1000/t 2000: spaceMusic/44 35/farmer 40 35 1 SuanNi 44 35 1/skippable/pause 2500/faceDirection SuanNi 3/pause 500/speak SuanNi "@?It's late, is there anything you haven't finished yet? $1"/move SuanNi -1 0 3/pause 500/speak SuanNi "Or we can do it tomorrow. I will take you back first. $1"/move farmer 2 0 1/question fork1 "#I just came to see you. #What are you doing at the beach?"/fork whatDo/pause 200/speak SuanNi "Come and see me....?$7"/emote SuanNi 16/pause 500/speak SuanNi "Sorry, I'm a little surprised...$7#$b#After all, this kind of thing rarely happens. $1"/pause 500/speak SuanNi "Although the people in the town are very kind to me, you and I are from two different races after all...$2#$b#I can feel...their worries and fears about me. $2#$b#Don't worry, I'm not blaming anyone, and this kind of thing won't affect me...$1#$b#But..."/pause 500/speak SuanNi "I want to talk to someone like this sometimes. $4#$b#@, thank you. $4#$b#Now, let me take you home. $1"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.whatDo: pause 200/speak SuanNi "I?#$b#I'm just enjoying the breeze at the beach. $1"/move SuanNi 0 1 2/pause 500/speak SuanNi "Stardew Valley is very beautiful, I think I can understand your grandfather's intention. $1"/move farmer 0 1 2/pause 1000/speak SuanNi "Everything here is full of rich spirits. Sorry, you can think of it as another kind of magic of the forest. $1"/pause 1000/speak SuanNi "How about you? Do you like this place now? $1#$b#Love every tree and grass here, as well as the waves on the beach. $1"/pause 1000/speak SuanNi "You don't have to tell me the answer.$1#$b# I think that your presence here has explained a lot.$1#$b# After all....$1"/pause 1000/speak SuanNi "The night sea in Stardew Valley is really beautiful. $1#$b#Okay. $1#$b#Now let me take you home. $1"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.9876503/F/f SuanNi 1500/e 9876501 987650: winter1/21 25/farmer 27 15 3 SuanNi 21 15 3/skippable/pause 1000/faceDirection SuanNi 1/pause 500/speak SuanNi "@, have you read my letter? $7#$b#Sorry, sorry, I didn't expect you to come so soon. $7#$b#When I saw you, it was a little difficult to say what I wanted to say...$1"/pause 1000/move farmer -4 0 3/pause 500/speak SuanNi "But you probably have a lot of questions now..."/pause 500/speak SuanNi "Do you know why I chose the secret forest? $1#$b#Because I woke up here at the beginning...$2#$b#% Suanni seemed to recall something, and his face gradually became a little sad...#$b#Let me tell you about the past...$2#$b#At the beginning, I just conducted a simple patrol. #$b#I found a few little demons and saw the area of ​​spiritual disorder. #$b#These are all normal.....#$b#But I always felt that something was wrong. #$b#So I thought, walk more, at least I can feel at ease. $2#$b#Then....A tree demon appeared in front of me."/pause 500/move SuanNi 0 3 2/move SuanNi -6 0 2/move farmer 0 4 3/move farmer -6 0 3/speak SuanNi "He was wailing, he was sobbing. #$b#He was begging for my help...$2#$b#I took him back to the furnace...$2#$b#Just like what Suanni did...$2#$b#%At this point, Suanni's voice seemed to become softer, and you couldn't quite hear the last sentence."/pause 500/speak SuanNi "We lived in peace for a long time. #$b#Until one night, the tree demon came to me alone. #$b#He seemed a little hesitant, his eyes full of hesitation and longing. #$b#In the end, he gave me a seed...$2#$b#A tree seed that he had hidden in his palm for a long time. $1"/pause 500/speak SuanNi "After that.....When I opened my eyes the next day, I was here...#$b#At first, when I woke up, I thought I was under someone's spell. #$b#Until I met you, I realized that I was no longer in the same place...$2"/question fork1 "#Can't you go back? #What on earth are you?"/fork way/pause 200/speak SuanNi "I... am trying to find a solution, but...$2#$b#% The lion glanced at you secretly, with some inexplicable emotions in his eyes. #$b# There are still things here that I can't let go...$2#$b# I have come here without saying goodbye, and I can't leave without saying goodbye."/pause 500/speak SuanNi "This is not polite...$2#$b#This is not polite...$2#$b#%You see the ears of the lion in front of you drooping down. For some reason, you seem to be able to sense some of the lion's thoughts...#$b#So, it's okay for me to live here for a while. $1"/pause 1000/speak SuanNi "But if I find a way to go home in the future, if you are willing...$1#$b#I want to take you to visit my hometown. $1#$b#By the way, I wonder if you recognize the seeds that the tree demon gave me. $1[MysticTreeSeed]#$b#Sure enough, this seed is the product of your world...$2#$b#I understand......$2#$b#Thank you,@, for listening to me$1"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue SuanNi "I really want to stay a little longer....$2"
Entries.way: speak SuanNi "Did you ask this question after all? $1#$b#If I were to put it in your terms. $1#$b#I am an orc...a dragon-lion orc. $1#$b#And according to what my hometown calls me. $1#$b#I am a sacred beast, a sacred beast that protects the land and is worshipped by people. $1#$b#They call me Suanni. $2#$b#%I don't know if it's your illusion, but when the lion in front of you talked about Suanni, a trace of sadness appeared on his face. #$b#But in fact, none of this matters. #$b#What matters is what kind of existence I am in your heart. $1#$b#I am a scary and cold black lion. $1#$b#Or I am a good guy worth communicating with. $1#$b#I think you should have your own judgment. $1"/pause 500/speak SuanNi "If you just want to know my story, we still have some time to chat. $1#$b#Until...I find a way to go home. $2#$b#But until I finish talking to you, I will stay in this town. $1#$b#And if you are interested in my hometown from what I said, even just a little bit...$2#$b#Can you go back with me to my hometown to have a look...$1#"/pause 500/speak SuanNi "Okay, okay, let's not talk about this for now. $1#$b#I have something I want to show you. $1#$b#This is the seed that the tree demon gave me. I wonder if you recognize it. $1[MysticTreeSeed]#$b#Sure enough, this seed is a product of your world...$2#$b#I understand......$2#$b#That's all for today, thank you,@, for listening to me$1"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end warpOut

Entries.9876504/F/f SuanNi 2000/e 9876501 987650: LavaMine/39 18/farmer 39 24 0 SuanNi 39 15 2/skippable/animate SuanNi false true 400 24 25 24/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -5 0/speak SuanNi "Don't... come over here! @! $8#$b#% The appearance of the Suanni seemed a little strange, as if it was in great pain and squatting on the ground. #$b# Just stand over there, I... I am in danger now. $8"/pause 500/speak SuanNi "Sorry to meet you in such a strange way...$2#$b#I just...want to see you. $8#$b#%You can clearly see the tense muscles of Suanni, as if he has used up all his strength just talking to you. #$b#Please just stand there and accompany me...$8"/pause 500/speak SuanNi "I can feel... your heartbeat seems to be getting faster... $2#$b# Sorry... are you worried about me? $8#$b# I must be in a mess right now. $2#$b#% Suanni seemed to want to smile at you, but in an instant his expression was covered by pain."/pause 500/speak SuanNi "I...$2#$b#In fact, I was not a Suanni at the beginning. I was just...$8#$b#a black lion demon in the forest...$8#$b#a demon that was excluded and abandoned. $2#$b#Until he brought me back to the furnace town...$8#$b#%Suanni's face flashed with guilt, as if he was lost in memories. #$b#So far, I have been suppressing the power and nature of being a demon every day. $8#$b#But now it seems...$8#$b#has the opposite effect...$2#$b#The demonic energy rushed into my body, and my divine power was also disordered. $8#$b#Maybe this is my fate...$3#$b#%I don't know if it's your illusion, but when he said this, Suanni's eyes flashed with an inaudible scarlet."/question fork1 "#Why not release your demonic power and embrace your nature? #Stay true to yourself and suppress your nature!"/fork sig/pause 500/speak SuanNi "Release my nature? I... never seem to have tried it before. $8#$b#% Suan Ni seemed to be stunned, and stood up from the ground with great effort."/stopAnimation SuanNi 0/speak SuanNi "No...it should be said that I dare not try...$2#$b#I don't want to go back to the past, and I don't want to touch the power of that time. $8#$b#But since it is what you want. $2#$b#I am willing to try...$8#$b#%Suan Ni closed his eyes, and you could feel that a violent energy began to gather on Suan Ni..."/stopMusic/pause 200/animate SuanNi false false 600 16 17 17 21 22 23/pause 3600/stopGlowing/stopAnimation SuanNi 23/playMusic winter1/speak SuanNi "%With the end of this power fluctuation, the lion in front of him almost changed its appearance#$b#%The chaos seemed to settle down, and the demonic power took the upper hand. #$b#Hmm.......$6#$b#How do I look? $6#$b#%You don't know how to describe the lion in front of you now, wild? Aggressive? But with a hint of familiar restraint and forbearance. #$b#@, are you afraid? $6#$b#No, you don't have to be afraid of me, I am still the Suanni you are familiar with. $6#$b#However, after accepting the demon power, I figured out some things. $6#$b#@, you are really delicious $6#$b#%Suanni laughed, compared with the past，There was a hint of arrogance and madness in that smile. $6#$b#But thank you, @, for coming to see me. $6#$b#Without you, I might not be able to hold on. $6#$b#I might even perish here. $6#$b#But fortunately I have you, @. $6#$b#Then next, it's time for me to repay you...$6"/mail SuanNiTown2/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end invisible SuanNi
Entries.sig: speak SuanNi "You are right, @.....$8#$b#How can I just go with the flow like this. $8#$b#%Suan Ni struggled to stand up from the ground."/stopAnimation SuanNi 0/speak SuanNi "How can you succumb to wildness? $8#$b#% Suanni closed his eyes, and you could feel a strange energy gathering in him...."/stopMusic/pause 200/animate SuanNi false false 600 16 17 17 18 19 20/pause 3600/stopGlowing/stopAnimation SuanNi 20/playMusic winter1/speak SuanNi "%Golden patterns continued to spread from the body of Suanni#$b#%The chaos seemed to be suppressed, and the lion in front of him also changed its appearance. #$b#How do I...$5#$b#look? $5#$b#%You don't know how to describe the lion in front of you, sacred? Majestic? In any case, it is different from the past. #$b#Don't worry, I am still me, the Suanni in your heart. $5#$b#%The lion in front of you seems to be able to see through your thoughts and soothes your worries with gentle words. #$b#The energy seems to have calmed down, thank you, @. $5#$b#If it weren't for you, I might not be able to hold on. $5#$b#I might even perish here. $5#$b#But fortunately you are here. $5#$b#%Suanni smiled at you, and his gentle smile seemed to be more sacred than before. #$b#So, do you want to walk with me now? $5"/mail SuanNiTown2/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end invisible SuanNi

Entries.9876505/F/f SuanNi 2500/e 9876501 987650: junimoStarSong/64 16/farmer 72 16 3 SuanNi 64 16 1/skippable/pause 500/speak SuanNi "@, I was still wondering where you went today. $7#$b# I wanted to ask you out, but I didn't expect to see you here, $1"/move farmer -6 0 3/speak SuanNi "Thank you for what happened last time. $1#$b#If you have nothing to do today, would you like to walk with me? $4#$b#I have a lot to say, and I have been holding it back for a long time. $1"/pause 200/move SuanNi -11 0 1/speak SuanNi "Since you came to Stardew Valley, you seem to be always busy. $1#$b#I have seen you out late many times...$2#$b#Your bag is full but you are rushing home. $2#$b#So it seems rare for you to have free time like now. $1"/pause 200/viewport move -2 0 5000/move farmer -11 0 3/pause 200/speak SuanNi "Come to think of it, I have been in Stardew Valley for quite some time. $1#$b# I have also participated in many festivals with you. $1#$b# But it is funny to say that in the beginning... I did not trust anyone. $2#$b# Strange environment, strange things, strange people. $1#$b# But fortunately, I have you, you all. $1#$b# You always show the greatest kindness to everything. $1#$b# Including me, a person of unknown origin...$1#$b# beast”。"/pause 200/move SuanNi -2 0 0/move SuanNi -0 -4 3/move SuanNi -7 0 1/speak SuanNi "I still remember meeting you at the beach. $1#$b#The evening breeze carried the smell of the sea. $1#$b#Everything was so beautiful and warm. $4#$b#Perhaps it was from then on that I always paid more attention to your figure. $1#$b#Tough, motivated, and compassionate. $1#$b#So strong, and so gentle. $1"/viewport move -2 -1 5000/move farmer -4 0 0/move farmer 0 -3 0/move farmer -7 0 0/faceDirection SuanNi 2/speak SuanNi "@. $2#$b#Thank you...$1#$b#for always being by my side. $4#$b#Although I have always told myself. $2#$b#I will return to my hometown one day. $2#$b#But once I see you. $1#$b#I always find it difficult to control the emotion in my heart...$2"/pause 200/move SuanNi -6 0 0/move SuanNi 0 -2 2/speak SuanNi "I want to know more about you...I want to see more of you. $4#$b#I want to feel your warmth and breath. $4#$b#I also want to be with you all the time. $4#$b#What kind of feeling is this? $2#$b#Does this feeling bother you?...$1"/viewport move -1 0 3000/move farmer -3 0 0/move farmer 0 -3 2/question fork1 "#No, I feel the same way about you. #Sorry, I thought we were just good friends."/fork no/speak SuanNi "！ ！ $7#$b#I...I...$7#$b#I thought it was just my wishful thinking. $1#$b#%The tail of the Suanni was swinging violently because of joy. This is the first time you have seen it do this. #$b#Sorry, I am a little excited. $1#$b#It's just, @. $4#$b#I am very happy, really happy. $4"/move SuanNi 0 1 2/move SuanNi 3 0 0/speak SuanNi "%The lion in front of you hugged you tightly...#$b#%The pleasant woody scent and soft fur all expressed each other's gentle feelings. #$b#%And from now on, you will both have each other..."/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue SuanNi "%The lion in front of you touches your head and gives you a gentle smile."
Entries.no: speak SuanNi "........$2#$b#Yes....We are just good friends. $1#$b#I am overthinking....$2#$b#I am sorry for talking to you for so long. I think I have delayed you for too long.....$1#$b#Let's...talk again when we have a chance. $1#$b#Goodbye....$1"/friendship SuanNi -2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end invisible SuanNi

Entries.9876506/F/f SuanNi 3000/e 9876501 987650: sweet/34 23/farmer 34 20 2 SuanNi 33 25 2/skippable/pause 500/emote SuanNi 32/pause 800/faceDirection SuanNi 0/speak SuanNi "@! $7#$b#If I had known you were coming here, I should have asked you to come with me. $4"/pause 200/move farmer 0 5 2/faceDirection SuanNi 2/emote farmer 20/pause 1500/speak SuanNi "After being with you. $1#$b#I often come here to walk. $1#$b#Maybe it's because of the scenery here. $1#$b#But I think more, it's because of you. $4"/pause 200/speak SuanNi "I still remember...$1#$b#the excitement and excitement in my heart when you said that here. $1#$b#For a long, long time....$2#$b#you are the only one who left such emotions in my heart. $1#$b#But I also know that being with me may bring you a lot of controversy. $2#$b#But I...$2#$b#don't want to deceive myself. $2#$b#nor do I want to give up this...precious emotion."/pause 200/emote SuanNi 12/pause 200/speak SuanNi "That's why I told you all those embarrassing things...$2#$b#. $4#$b# Fortunately, the ending is always good. $4#$b#% Suanni gave you a gentle smile, just like he had done to you countless times before, warm and beautiful.。"/pause 500/faceDirection SuanNi 1/speak SuanNi "Actually, I didn't have much feelings for Stardew Valley before. $2#$b#Because I always felt that I was just a passer-by. $2#$b#No matter what kind of intersection we had, after I left. $2#$b#It would also be gone. $2#$b#Although Stardew Valley is beautiful, it is not my home. $1"/pause 500/faceDirection SuanNi 2/pause 300/speak SuanNi "But you are different. $1#$b#You made me really nostalgic in Stardew Valley. $1#$b#You also made me really have a home in Stardew Valley. $1#$b#So@, on the road ahead...$1#$b#I will always be with you...always. $4"/pause 200/stopAnimation SuanNi 28/pause 200/speak SuanNi "%Suanni hugged you and kissed you. You could feel the full of love hidden in the touch of his soft mane.....#$b#%"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.9876507/F/f SuanNi 3500/e 9876501 987650: winter3/40 20/farmer 43 27 1 SuanNi 49 27 1/skippable/pause 500/emote SuanNi 12/pause 800/speak SuanNi "他会喜欢这个吗...$2"/pause 200/move farmer 4 0 1/pause 200/faceDirection SuanNi 3/emote SuanNi 16/pause 200/speak SuanNi "@! $7#$b#You....why are you here? $7#$b#%You saw a panicked expression on Suanni's face, and hid his hands behind his back unnaturally.。"/pause 200/speak SuanNi "Ahem... I just remembered to come to the secret forest. $7#$b# What are you doing here? I... I'll help you. $1#$b#% Although the other party tried to cover up something, it was obvious that the big lion in front of him really couldn't lie. #$b#% The tail swung unnaturally, and the strange blush on his face...#$b#% Everything was telling that this matter was not so simple。"/pause 200/emote SuanNi 28/pause 200/speak SuanNi "As expected, I can't hide it from you...$2#$b#I saw you go down to the mines sometimes. $1#$b#Although the monsters in the mines can't hurt you...$2#$b#I'm still worried...$1#$b#so I thought...to make you a weapon. $1#$b#I've actually been making it for a while...$2#$b#but...$1#$b#I don't know what kind of weapon you like. $1#$b#"/pause 200/speak SuanNi "Do you remember the disorder of my power before? #$b#Don't worry, I'm fine now. $1#$b#@, I think I can try to use this power to forge a weapon for you. $1#$b#Do you prefer divine power or demonic power? $1"/question fork1 "#divinepower. #demonpower。"/fork inquiry/pause 500/speak SuanNi "I understand。"/pause 500/animate SuanNi false true 500 36 36 37 37 37 38 38 38 39 39 39 39/pause 6000/stopAnimation SuanNi 43/speak SuanNi "%You seem to feel a constant flow of air towards the lion in front of you. In just a few breaths, the other party has changed its appearance. #$b#%The golden dragon horns and textures are glittering, but what is more eye-catching is the ball of light condensed in its hand. #$b#%You seem to vaguely see the shape of a sword inside。"/pause 500/speak SuanNi "It's done! $5#$b#% Suanni seemed very happy, and the sword fell into your hands.。[SuanNi_Sword]#$b#How about calling this sword Yunyun? $11#$b#As long as you carry it, I will know whether your current situation is safe or not. $5#$b#%Suan Ni rubbed your head, the touch of its fur was very nice. #$b#But even with this sword, please be sure to pay attention to your own safety. $5#$b#I... don't want to lose you so soon. $5#$b#Okay, okay, you already know the secret. $5#$b#Then can you leave your time to me from now on? $5#$b#%The lion in front of you took your hand. #$b#First of all, let me try the sword. $5"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.inquiry: speak SuanNi "I understand。"/pause 500/animate SuanNi false true 500 36 36 37 37 37 40 40 40 41 41 41 41/pause 6000/stopAnimation SuanNi 42/speak SuanNi "%You seem to feel a constant flow of air towards the lion in front of you. In just a few breaths, the other party has changed its appearance. #$b#%Blood-red lines are winding up, but what is more eye-catching is the ball of light condensed in its hand. #$b#%You seem to vaguely see the shape of a dagger inside。"/pause 500/speak SuanNi "Done! $10#$b#% Suanni seemed very happy and handed the dagger in his hand to you.。[SuanNi_dagger]#$b#This dagger...how about calling it Nightmare Mist. $6#$b#As long as you carry it, I believe nothing can threaten you. $6#$b#%Suan Ni rubbed your head and smiled evilly. #$b#Of course, you can use it on me. $6#$b#Although it can't hurt me, it's still a kind of fun. $10#$b#Okay, okay, now that you know the secret. $10#$b#Then can you leave your time to me? $10#$b#%The lion in front of you took your hand. $10#$b#Don't worry...just try the dagger. $10#$b#Or if you want to try other weapons first, that's fine. $10#$b#%Suan Ni took your hand and placed it on his exposed body. #$b#%The hot body temperature made your heart beat faster for some reason. #$b#Let's go. If you want to watch it, we can go home and watch it slowly. $10"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
